# Object-oriented Tic Tac Toe Game

## Description

Tic Tac Toe is a 2-player board game played on a 3x3 grid. Players take turns marking a square. The first player to mark 3 squares in a row wins.

### Nouns and verbs

**Nouns**
- game
  - board (grid)
    - square
      - player (mark)
  - players (list)
    - player

**Verbs**
- mark_square
- determine_win (row or diagonal of player marks)

### CRC Cards

Formalize objects and associate verbs with nouns.

- [View CRC Cards - interactive](https://echeung.me/crcmaker/?)
- [View CRC Cards](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lightmotive/ls-rb120-lessons/main/lesson05/oo_tic_tac_toe/crc_cards.pdf)
